ing: 1 (16 ounce) can red kidney beans, drained
1 (46 fluid ounce) can canned vegetable juice
des: "I call this my accident chili because I tried to find a great chili recipe and couldn't, so I just started adding things and by accident it was great. If you are looking for a sweet or spicy recipe this is not it. This is just a traditional good recipe."
ins:
In a skillet over medium heat, brown the ground beef and cook the onion until tender. Drain grease.
In a pot, mix the beef and onion, beans, vegetable juice, tomato sauce, tomato paste, and tomatoes. Season with salt, garlic powder, and pepper. Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer 45 minutes, stirring occasionally.
